group_1.narration: My father informed me that a road expansion project@was slated for Futatsugi, based on zoning plans.
And when I looked at the detailed map he provided,@I noticed that construction was going to take place...@right on top of the catacombs.

group_1.textLeft: ...That means the catacombs would be dug up...@doesn't it?

group_1.textRight: That...can't be good.@There are dead bodies buried in there...

group_1.textLeft: If all that shit gets exposed, then...

group_1.textRight: The cops will take Yuna away...
W-waaaaah...!@Our nightmare's happening all over again...!

group_1.textLeft: Settle down, please...
Phrasing it like that makes it sound like@I've been caught before...
That was nothing more than a terrible dream...
We need to forget about it and move on@to the future...

group_1.textRight: ...Um, so this is bad because...?

group_1.textLeft: The catacombs are a Magical Girl graveyard.
If those corpses were to be unearthed, the police@would inevitably get brought in...
And if they find out that there's a connection@between those bodies and Magical Girls...
They'll think we're murderous demons,@and we'll become enemies to the whole world.

group_1.textRight: Ah...

group_1.textLeft: I'm trying to think of an approach to@stop the construction,
but simply being the mayor's daughter doesn't@give me the power to overturn such things...

group_1.textRight: And I mean, it's not like we can just tell them@about our buddies' corpses.
I wish we could at least move their remains@somewhere else,
but the catacombs are a really significant@place for us...

group_1.textLeft: Indeed. It's somewhere we can seek closure@for the girls who died...
I don't want to lose that...

group_1.textRight: Juri the Great still hasn't made peace with them@yet herself.

group_1.textLeft: I could have reconciled with them when I made@a truce with the Union, but...

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah, back then, I was kinda...

group_1.textLeft: ...However, all I did was ask them for forgiveness...
In that sense, you and I are no different...

group_1.textRight: Point is, I haven't done squat to patch things up yet.
If the tomb's gotta go, I need to get on that@before then.
Having said all that, how are you gonna go about it?

group_1.textLeft: Well, the old Juri the Great had been considerin'@givin' her life up.

group_1.textRight: You were WHAT?! Don't you dare!

group_1.textLeft: You don't gotta tell me that.@I know.
I can't die and leave behind all the things@I wanna protect, like you guys...
But I still gotta find a way to settle stuff@one way or another.
I don't believe we have much time to@mull this over...

group_1.textRight: ...What are we gonna do?
...I was wondering why you suddenly asked us@all to get together.
You want Asahi to use her personal magic@to summon the departed of Futatsugi?

group_1.textLeft: Yes please!

group_1.textRight: So that Ooba and her friends can reconcile@with their lost allies?

group_1.textLeft: If they can talk to the dead and get their forgiveness,@then both sides'll be at peace, see.

group_1.textRight: ...Would it really be as simple as it sounds?
Besides, that magic isn't something@that Asahi is really...
...I cannot comply.

group_1.textLeft: But why not...?!

group_1.textRight: ...First of all, there are many unknowns when@it comes to deceased Magical Girls,
such as whether they turned into Witches or@their Soul Gems were shattered.
I'm unsure if I would even be able to call@their ghosts out at all.

group_1.textLeft: But you'll never know until you try, see!

group_1.textRight: ...The spirits of the departed are not easy@for me to summon.
Doing so is what I call a desecration of life...@Urara.
Furthermore... We don't know if the ghosts that@my magic summons are real or not.
They may be illusions created by our memories,
or perhaps memories that were ingrained@in the corpses...

group_1.textLeft: But I still wanna return the favor to Yuna@and everyone else, y'know?
If the catacombs disappear like this,@I know I'll regret it, see...
Plus...I...

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: Nothin'.
...Please, Asahi, I'm beggin' you!

group_1.textRight: ...*Sigh*...[wait:0.8][chara:103401:cheek_0][chara:103401:eyeClose_0][chara:103401:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json][chara:103401:lipSynch_1] Roger that.
It sounds as though you have an additional motive@for wanting me to call the deceased.
If it's your request, then I suppose I have no choice.

group_1.textLeft: I got no other reasons whatsoever, okay?!

group_1.textRight: ...Of course not.
Now then, if we're going to do this,@we'd best prepare ourselves.
...Right. We can't make the same mistakes@we made back then.
